question: 命名下列配位化合物。$\left\lbrack {\mathrm{{Pt}}{\left( {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\right) }_{2}{\left( \mathrm{{OH}}\right) }_{2}{\mathrm{{Cl}}}_{2}}\right\rbrack$
